description:
Play as popular characters from the psychic horror adventure Death Mark & NG (Experience Inc.)!

The following items are included:
NPC characters (set of 5)
Yashiki/Mary/Kijima/Amanome/Hazuki

*After downloading the DLC, you can select the character illustrations you have obtained from the Appearance tab during character creation.
*This content is available for a limited time only.
ã€€Period: January 27, 2022 - February 16, 2022
name: Fourth Collaboration: Death Mark & NG Characters
